channel.title: And if some1 knows i need help with chatbox interface problems (508)
channel.description:
if i make a chat with a npc and a player i use: packethandler.java, and npcoption1.java
but i currently use npc 1 as a face for the player when he sais something, can some please tell me what kind of code(s) i need to use to make the players name and face appear in the chatbox
i realy need help wif this one ty
